src_original: 16917 sannahya sarvasattvāparityāginā bhavitavyam/  sarvasattvānām antike mayā
17001 sarvasattvān api mayā parinirvāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati/
avyavakīrṇena mayā  17003 sarvākārajñatācittena ṣāṭsu pāramitāsu caritavyam/
sarvatrānugatāyāṃ sarvadharma-  17004 prativedhapariniṣpattyāṃ mayā śikṣitavyam/  ekatayābhinirhāro mayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ
17005 pratiboddhavyaḥ yāvat pāramitābhinirhāra{prativedhāya mayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ śikṣitavyam/  } saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣadharmābhinirhāra-  17006 {prativedhāya mayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ śikṣitavyam}/
